20110113005324.000|20110113005326.000|CC1|Even with an overactive bladder,
20110113005326.000|20110113005326.000|CC1|  I don't always let the worry

20110113005333.000|20110113005336.000|CC1|  visit than just the bathroom. 
20110113005336.000|20110113005336.000|CC1|          ( announcer )         
20110113005336.000|20110113005338.000|CC1|       Once-daily VESIcare      
20110113005338.000|20110113005338.000|CC1|      can help control your     
20110113005338.000|20110113005339.000|CC1|         bladder muscle,        
20110113005339.000|20110113005339.000|CC1|        and is proven to        
20110113005339.000|20110113005341.000|CC1|    treat overactive bladder    
20110113005341.000|20110113005341.000|CC1| with symptoms of frequent urges
20110113005341.000|20110113005345.000|CC1|    and leaks, day and night.   
20110113005345.000|20110113005345.000|CC1|       If you have certain      
20110113005345.000|20110113005347.000|CC1|  stomach or glaucoma problems, 
20110113005347.000|20110113005347.000|CC1|       or trouble emptying      
20110113005347.000|20110113005348.000|CC1|          your bladder,         
20110113005348.000|20110113005350.000|CC1|      do not take VESIcare.     
20110113005350.000|20110113005350.000|CC1|       VESIcare may cause       
20110113005350.000|20110113005352.000|CC1|       allergic reactions       
20110113005352.000|20110113005353.000|CC1|      that may be serious.      
20110113005353.000|20110113005353.000|CC1|   If you experience swelling   
20110113005353.000|20110113005355.000|CC1|       of the face, lips,       
20110113005355.000|20110113005355.000|CC1|  throat or tongue, stop taking 
20110113005355.000|20110113005358.000|CC1|VESIcare and get emergency help.
20110113005358.000|20110113005359.000|CC1|   Tell your doctor right away  
20110113005359.000|20110113005359.000|CC1|       if you have severe       
20110113005359.000|20110113005401.000|CC1|         abdominal pain         
20110113005401.000|20110113005401.000|CC1|      or become constipated     
20110113005401.000|20110113005404.000|CC1|     for three or more days.    
20110113005404.000|20110113005404.000|CC1|       VESIcare may cause       
20110113005404.000|20110113005405.000|CC1|         blurred vision,        
20110113005405.000|20110113005405.000|CC1|  so use caution while driving  
20110113005405.000|20110113005408.000|CC1|     or doing unsafe tasks.

20110113005410.000|20110113005412.000|CC1|        and indigestion.
